errors.error_description: Specified Python 2.7 as minimum version requirement, which is outdated and incompatible with modern dependencies
correction_candidates: Before installing, make sure you have Python 3.8 or later installed on your system.
Before installing, make sure you have Python 3.6 or later installed on your system.
Before installing, make sure you have Python 3.7 or later installed on your system.
Before installing, make sure you have Python 3.9 or later installed on your system.
errors.golden_answer: Before installing, make sure you have Python 3.8 or later installed on your system.
